snippet.title: Longplay: Yogho Yogho (1995) [MS-DOS]
snippet.description:
Here’s yet another cute little platformer. It’s fast passed jumping crawling key finding fruit collecting action game. It was made as a commercial for (get this) a Yoghurt brand and thus it seems to be a bit childish (at least the pictures look like that), but don’t let that fool you. This game is nothing to be sneezed at. It’s really a full time platform game, but the villains look much funnier then in most similar games. I mean honestly, how many games can claim to have a granny in a wheelchair chasing after you, trying to beat you with a stick? But then again, in how many games do you need to make a crying cow with empty udder happy again?

Well the animation runs very smoothly, the sounds are pleasant and although he same tune is repeating over and over it doesn’t become annoying. The colors are bright and cheerful and your character really adorable.
